revised_title: Expression and Intracellular Distribution of Drosophila Heat Shock Protein in Mammalian Cells
tldr: The article discusses the expression and intracellular distribution of a Drosophila heat shock protein (hsp70) in mammalian cells. The hsp70 protein was found to have multiple interactions with cellular components, including a transient association with nucleoli in stressed cells. This study provides insights into the functions of hsp70 and its role in cell stress response.
